brands.name: Chanel
brands.iconic_hover: I dont do fashion, i AM fashion. - Coco Chanel
brands.iconic_sayings: If Coco wasn't such a rebel, costume jewellery would still be scoffed at. A huge `faux pas`. Something worn by `riff-raff and `low-class` citizens. Well, Miss Chanel absolutely put an end to that ridiculousness. In fact, all the pearls she was so famous for wearing were not real! The global market for costume jewellery is currently valued at over 17 Billion USD.

brands.name: Louis Vuitton
brands.iconic_sayings: Louis Vuitton was not known for a slogan per se. By combining the phrase 'the Truth' with “L.V”, “Live the Truth” or “Love the Truth” refers to someone being true and confident in expressing personal fashion style, brand or lifestyle choices bringing us to

brands.name: Levi Strauss
brands.founder: Levi Strauss, 1853 - San Francisco, California, U.S
brands.iconic_hover: I mean...`Have you ever had a bad time in Levi’s?`
brands.iconic_sayings: The absolute essence and forefront of American fashion. The world’s largest maker of pants to this very day. Being so ahead of their time, Levi's introduced the very first womens blue jeans via 1934. Although there has been plenty of taglines over the years, `Our models can beat up their models`, says it all! Ah, good ol', true blue, Levi Strauss and Co.

brands.name: Versace
brands.founder: Gianni Versace, Donatella Versace, 1989 - Milan Italy
brands.iconic_hover: Gianni - `Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are.`
brands.iconic_sayings: Donatella - `Why do women need men nowadays? Certainly not to prove strength, determination and independence anymore. Men are needed only for love affairs and for physical relaxation.`...
